/* PrsPmpMap.SelectPrsPmpList 가압펌프장 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PRES_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.PRS_NAM = #PRS_NAM#
A.SAG_CDE = #SAG_CDE#
A.PRS_SAH LIKE '%'||#PRS_SAH#||'%'
A.PRS_VOL = #PRS_VOL#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.FNS_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.FNS_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS FNS_YMD , A.PRS_NAM , A.PRS_ARA , A.SAG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250005' AND DTL_CD = A.SAG_CDE ) AS SAG_NAM , A.PRS_ALT , A.PRS_VOL , A.PRS_ARE , A.PRS_SAH , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PRES_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.PRS_NAM = #PRS_NAM#
A.SAG_CDE = #SAG_CDE#
A.PRS_SAH LIKE '%'||#PRS_SAH#||'%'
A.PRS_VOL = #PRS_VOL#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* PrsPmpMap.SelectPrsPmpDtl 가압펌프장 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.FNS_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.FNS_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS FNS_YMD , A.PRS_NAM , A.PRS_ARA , A.SAG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250005' AND DTL_CD = A.SAG_CDE ) AS SAG_NAM , A.PRS_ALT , A.PRS_VOL , A.PRS_ARE , A.PRS_SAH , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PRES_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_PRES_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , FNS_YMD , PRS_NAM , PRS_ARA , SAG_CDE , PRS_ALT , PRS_VOL , PRS_ARE , PRS_SAH , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , decode(length(#FNS_YMD#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '') , #PRS_NAM# , #PRS_ARA# , #SAG_CDE# , #PRS_ALT# , #PRS_VOL# , #PRS_ARE# , #PRS_SAH# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# )

/* 가압펌프장 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_PRES_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , FNS_YMD = decode(length(#FNS_YMD#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '') , PRS_NAM = #PRS_NAM# , PRS_ARA = #PRS_ARA# , SAG_CDE = #SAG_CDE# , PRS_ALT = #PRS_ALT# , PRS_VOL = #PRS_VOL# , PRS_ARE = #PRS_ARE# , PRS_SAH = #PRS_SAH# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
/* 가압펌프장 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_PRES_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
